pageContext.description: A single strand measures 16.5 inches - formed of a complicated plait work of 8 wires. It is fastened by means of a round bolt and a double sliding pin.
pageContext.collection: National Museum of Science and Art, Dublin,Frontispiece 474, 232, 1903
pageContext.site: Ireland,Co. Londonderry,near Limavady,in the barony of Keenaght,townland of Broighter,found in a field (1896) on the farm of Mr. Joseph L. Gibson - by ploughmen
pageContext.toSearch: Broighter Rd, Limavady, Limavady Bt49 9du, UK
pageContext.museumCollection: National Museum of Science & Art, Dublin
